name: Carol Anne Hilton, MBA
body:
Carol Anne Hilton, MBA@Hesquiaht8 Feb 2022#indigenomicsin actionAJ+@ajplus7 Feb 2022New Zealand's Māori Party called for a "divorce" from the British royal family and their removal as head of state.

The call came on the anniversary of a treaty that claimed crown protection of Māori land rights — which British colonizers broke, confiscating 90% of their land.12

body: Carol Anne Hilton, MBA@Hesquiaht3 Feb 2022#indigenomicsin action#indigenouseconomy#100billionChief Billy Morin@billymorinECN3 Feb 2022This is Not just token Indigenous Economic Inclusion; Enbridge has partnered with us for up to 1/2 ownership of the proposed Wabamun Carbon Capture Hub.
